A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Who are the First Order? Where do they come from? Who is snope where did he come from? Why are Rey's parents just meh? The republic bombers are the worst weapon ever made. 

Story: 2.5
While some great elements the story was ruined by plot holes. Luke Skywalker was abused.

Technical: 0.5
This film had so many technical holes they were hard to ignore. Usually\, I try and suspend disbelief but this movie was terrible. Bombs dropping to what gravity?
Guns designed to kill fighters suddenly cant hit them\, opening doors to space now is ok with no airlock\, going into hyperspace now destroys massive ships as you fly past their location...um...why arent hyperspace missiles a thing?\, why did she wait to fly into them?

Plot holes:
Too many to list. There are literally four thousand plot holes in this move.
